com.github.protobufel.el

Class ELContextEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.el.ELContext
      • com.github.protobufel.el.ELContextEx

  • public class ELContextEx
extends javax.el.ELContext
    A customized ELContext to be set on StandardELContext. Replaces the standard BeanELResolver with the more advanced BeanELResolverEx.

    Usage: replace the standard StandardELContext with new StandardELContext(new ELContextEx()), or via ELManager.setELContext(new ELContextEx()).

    Author:
    protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler
